title: Ticket #255: Enhance stduniv compressed file support
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

This patch uses the idea of "sync points" for compressed files to allow fstat() to work on compressed files where it didn't previously and to significantly improve fseek() performance by avoiding the need to read in the whole file.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (7).
creator: gquinn
